name: Litson & Associates (Pty) Ltd
about: Litson & Associates (Pty) Ltd is a global leader in aviation safety advisory, quality auditing, training, and software services. As a South African Civil Aviation Authority (SA CAA) approved training organisation, we provide professional aviation safety and quality advice to aircraft and airport operators, as well as oil, gas, and other industries. Our services include safety reviews of airlines and charter aircraft operators, ensuring the highest standards of safety from planning to landing. We are committed to making our skies the safest on Earth and look forward to continuing our work in enhancing flight safety worldwide.
